name.label: Name
name.description: Short textual identifier for the entity in this row, typically a person or system name, used for quick visual referencing and grouping.

team.label: Team
team.description: Organization or group that the entity belongs to. This field is commonly used to compare behavior or performance across different teams.

position.label: Position
position.description: Functional role of the entity within its context (e.g., Guard, Forward). It is useful for aggregations, stratified analysis and role-based comparisons.

country.label: Country
country.description: Country or region associated with the entity, enabling geographical breakdowns, international vs. domestic analysis and location-aware filtering.

height_cm.label: Height (cm)
height_cm.description: Height of the entity expressed in centimeters. As a numeric attribute it is suitable for distributions, correlation analysis and visual encodings such as bar or scatter plots.

weight_kg.label: Weight (kg)
weight_kg.description: Weight of the entity expressed in kilograms. Frequently combined with height or position to characterize physical profiles and role-specific body types.

era.label: Era
era.description: Coarse time period or version bucket (e.g., modern, two_thousands) that helps separate entities by their active era when analyzing longitudinal or historical patterns.

play_style.label: Play Style
play_style.description: Short label describing the dominant behavioral pattern of the entity (e.g., scorer, slasher). It supports semantic grouping, clustering and high-level style comparison.

rating.label: Rating
rating.description: Unified scalar score summarizing overall quality or effectiveness. This field is typically used for rankings, leaderboards, thresholding and top-k comparisons.

archetype.label: Archetype
archetype.description: High-level role template that compresses multiple attributes into a single tag (e.g., two_way_forward), making individual profiles easier to interpret at a glance.
